statements: DELETE FROM ShippingInfo WHERE order_id = 123 AND delivery_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM ShippingInfo WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND delivery_status = 'Processing';
DELETE FROM ShippingInfo WHERE shipping_address LIKE '%New York%' AND delivery_status = 'Delivered';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM delivery_updates WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' AND email_address = 'john@example.com';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM products WHERE stock_quantity = 0 AND price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%';
